about_the_game:
100% Orange Juice - Yuki & Tomomo Renewal Pack adds 2 new playable character combinations from developer Orange Juice's games. Meet Yuki (Dangerous), who disrupts the play by seeking wins through trap use, and a brand new version of the game's end boss: Tomomo (Casual) who can transform to Tomomo (Sweet Eater) if she can just bother to get up from the bed. Includes character and announcer voices for both characters.

Character Pack includes

  • Yuki (Dangerous) from ‘QP Shooting - Dangerous!!’ (Voice: Aiya Saki)
  • Tomomo (Casual) & Tomomo (Sweet Eater) (Voice: Aranami Kazusa)
  • New, unique Hyper Cards and mechanics for both characters to bring chaos to the battlefield with!
  • New music tracks play as Yuki (Dangerous) and Tomomo's themes

The new characters are designed by Orange Juice’s original staff for the game’s English Steam release, with character and card artwork by Hono.

100% Orange Juice - Yuki & Tomomo Renewal Pack adds 2 new playable character combinations from developer Orange Juice's games. Meet Yuki (Dangerous), who disrupts the play by seeking wins through trap use, and a brand new version of the game's end boss: Tomomo (Casual) who can transform to Tomomo (Sweet Eater) if she can just bother to get up from the bed. Includes character and announcer voices for both characters.

Character Pack includes

  • Yuki (Dangerous) from ‘QP Shooting - Dangerous!!’ (Voice: Aiya Saki)
  • Tomomo (Casual) & Tomomo (Sweet Eater) (Voice: Aranami Kazusa)
  • New, unique Hyper Cards and mechanics for both characters to bring chaos to the battlefield with!
  • New music tracks play as Yuki (Dangerous) and Tomomo's themes

The new characters are designed by Orange Juice’s original staff for the game’s English Steam release, with character and card artwork by Hono.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct3D compatible video card with 128MB memory or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card

short_description: 100% Orange Juice - Yuki & Tomomo Renewal Pack adds Yuki (Dangerous), who disrupts the play by seeking wins through trap use, and a brand new version of the game's end boss: Tomomo (Casual) who can upgrade to Tomomo (Sweet Eater) if she can just bother to get out of her futon.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
